title: Wall Facing, ca. 1725
description: Vertical rectangular panel of tiles; dark purple (manganese) on white ground showing arched framework; oval cartouche bearing double monogram, supported by pair of nude amors; pair of small amors holding crown above, borne by pair of female terms; surrounded by leafscrolls and foliations, with pair of flower-filled urns; top center, lunetted amor's head pendented with rosetted lattice cartouche.

tombstone.epitaph:
Wall Facing, ca. 1725.
ca. 1725. Tin-glazed earthenware, underglaze. Gift of William Randolph Hearst. 1926-43-3.
